data.eml:eml: New species of Agathodesmus Silvestri, 1910 from Australia (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Haplodesmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mesibov, Robert (2013): New species of Agathodesmus Silvestri, 1910 from Australia (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Haplodesmidae). ZooKeys 325: 33-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.325.5932, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.325.5932
